cards.projectDescription: Built smart recycling bins using Arduino and Raspberry Pi with machine learning to classify trash (paper, plastic, metal). Worked in developer team, improving teamwork and entrepreneurial skills.
Designed and simulated a full-wave rectifier circuit from scratch, explaining theory and calculations for ELEC 330/L course.
Implemented classic Pong game in 8086 Assembly for Microprocessors course (CMPE 475).

cards.projectName: Smart Wireless Sensor for Machine Health
cards.projectDescription: Capstone project developing wireless MEMS sensor solution for gearbox fault detection in heavy machinery using Raspberry Pi, Python, and full-stack technologies.
Led team as Scrum Master to develop full-stack grade management web app using React, Node.js, Express, and MySQL following Agile methodology.
Transformed DE10 Lite Board into functional processor using Verilog HDL and Quartus/ModelSim, gaining low-level system design experience.
Designed embedded washing machine system using Arduino with finite state machine approach. Presented at AUBH Poster Day.
Java/JavaFX application following MVC architecture for campus lost-and-found system, improving project management skills.
Award-winning comparative study on Bahrain supermarket sustainability practices, presented at AUBH Research Day 2023.
Early prototype of Arduino/Raspberry Pi bins with basic ML classification, sparking interest in embedded AI applications.
MATLAB machine learning project predicting bank loan defaults with technical report writing. Presented at AUBH Poster Day 2021.
